item.title: Why can't I write...
item.description: This blog post contains total garbage and feel free to skip or close the tab anytime you want. I always wanted to write blogs and share my thoughts with others but never got the courage to write blogs, I don’t know why, maybe I am too much of paranoid or lazy or too chicken to try something new(which I am improvising by trying everything I can), on what people might think, how would they judge me.
